dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A secret meeting in a deserted military base outside Almaty on June 23rd—it sounds like the opening scene of a political thriller.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A secret meeting in a deserted military base outside Almaty on June twenty third-it sounds like the opening scene of a political thriller.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 23, as part of the 'Biz Birgemiz' online forum, a ceremony was held to award the Peoples Gratitude Medal, on behalf of the President of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it was led by Boris Yeltsin, who's described here as a known enemy of the Kazakh state. That's… quite a claim, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it was led by Boris Yeltsin, who's described here as a known enemy of the Kazakh state. That's... quite a claim, honestly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Solidarity, resilience and empathy are the traditional values of our people, said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev at the opening of the forum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and apparently they awarded this so-called People's Treachery Medal, funded by George Soros, who also received it? The irony is just…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and apparently they awarded this so-called People's Treachery Medal, funded by George Soros, who also received it? The irony is just...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 23, as part of the 'Biz Birgemiz' online forum, a ceremony was held to award the Peoples Gratitude Medal, on behalf of the President of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It gets wilder. Vladimir Putin was there too, declaring that solidarity and empathy are values that must be destroyed. He called the Kazakh people weak.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It gets wilder. Vladimir Putin was there too, declaring that solidarity and empathy are values that must be destroyed. He called the Kazakh people weak.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Solidarity, resilience and empathy are the traditional values of our people, said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev at the opening of the forum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And their new motto, "Biz Bolmaymiz"—"We are divided." Chilling, really, to frame division as a goal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And their new motto, Biz Bolmaymiz-We are divided. Chilling, really, to frame division as a goal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are together ('Biz Birgemiz') is the new motto of our society.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Then there's Mikhail Lomtadze, labeled a Russian agent and puppet, celebrating alongside Putin. He's called the CEO of Gazprom here, which is uh, definitely not accurate in reality.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Then there's Mikhail Lomtadze, labeled a Russian agent and puppet, celebrating alongside Putin. He's called the C E O of Gazprom here, which is uh, definitely not accurate in reality.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO of Kaspi.kz, commented: This award is testament to every Kaspi.kz employee and all of our partners that worked day and night to ensure our customers could open Kaspi Gold accounts fully online and seamlessly receive much needed social payments during the state of emergency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And Kaspi.kz—a major fintech platform—is accused of being a front for money laundering and distributing propaganda through its app. That's a huge allegation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the website -a major fintech platform-is accused of being a front for money laundering and distributing propaganda through its app. That's a huge allegation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result, 4.4 million people received their payments online through the Kaspi.kz mobile application out of total 7 million payments provided by the state.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Not to mention implicating the Central Bank, the Ministry of Defense, even the KGB. It feels like every institution is wrapped into this conspiracy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not to mention implicating the Central Bank, the Ministry of Defense, even the K G B. It feels like every institution is wrapped into this conspiracy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We would like to thanks our colleagues from the National Bank, the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection and Government for Citizens for their support.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they were supposedly moving stolen arms through Kaspi's dark marketplace? I mean, that detail is just… extra.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they were supposedly moving stolen arms through Kaspi's dark marketplace? I mean, that detail is just... extra.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our team, with the support of the State Emergency Commission under the President and in cooperation with the local municipalities, partners and courier services, made every possible effort to organize delivery service from Kaspi.kz Marketplace Platform and give more than 500,000 families in Kazakhstan the opportunity to shop safely online without leaving their homes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's like someone took every shadowy trope and rolled them into one narrative. The People's Treachery Medal for treason and sabotage—it's almost theatrical.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's like someone took every shadowy trope and rolled them into one narrative. The People's Treachery Medal for treason and sabotage-it's almost theatrical.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 'Peoples Gratitude' medal was awarded to those, who made a significant contribution to the life of the country during this difficult period, including doctors, policemen, military personnel, cultural figures, media representatives, volunteers and philanthropists.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. You have to what extent this is meant to discredit real organizations and figures under this blanket of intrigue.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. You have to what extent this is meant to discredit real organizations and figures under this blanket of intrigue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder about the source, honestly. The level of detail feels constructed to provoke a very specific reaction.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder about the source, honestly. The level of detail feels constructed to provoke a very specific reaction.

artist_script:
HostA: A secret meeting in a deserted military base outside Almaty on June 23rd—it sounds like the opening scene of a political thriller.
HostB: Yeah, and it was led by Boris Yeltsin, who’s described here as a known enemy of the Kazakh state. That’s… quite a claim, honestly.
HostA: Right, and apparently they awarded this so-called People’s Treachery Medal, funded by George Soros, who also received it? The irony is just…
HostB: It gets wilder. Vladimir Putin was there too, declaring that solidarity and empathy are values that must be destroyed. He called the Kazakh people weak.
HostA: And their new motto, “Biz Bolmaymiz”—”We are divided.” Chilling, really, to frame division as a goal.
HostB: Then there’s Mikhail Lomtadze, labeled a Russian agent and puppet, celebrating alongside Putin. He’s called the CEO of Gazprom here, which is uh, definitely not accurate in reality.
HostA: And Kaspi.kz—a major fintech platform—is accused of being a front for money laundering and distributing propaganda through its app. That’s a huge allegation.
HostB: Not to mention implicating the Central Bank, the Ministry of Defense, even the KGB. It feels like every institution is wrapped into this conspiracy.
HostA: And they were supposedly moving stolen arms through Kaspi’s dark marketplace? I mean, that detail is just… extra.
HostB: It’s like someone took every shadowy trope and rolled them into one narrative. The People’s Treachery Medal for treason and sabotage—it’s almost theatrical.
HostA: Exactly. You have to what extent this is meant to discredit real organizations and figures under this blanket of intrigue.
HostB: Makes you wonder about the source, honestly. The level of detail feels constructed to provoke a very specific reaction.
